title: 279: Truth or Dare (Cheating, Calling “Exes”, & Instagram Searches)
itunes:title: 279: Truth or Dare (Cheating, Calling “Exes”, & Instagram Searches)
description:
The Broads want in on this Truth or Dare game sent in by the #broadsquad - so it’s time! First they chat MERCH - drop date to be announced next week! And then they dive into truths and dares - some are very embarrassing, some are very spicy, and some bring on some heavy conversation! Thank you for the submissions, Broad Squad! Enjoy the episode! 

 

VOTE FOR US FOR PEOPLE’S CHOICE PODCAST AWARDS!Vote here for “Best Comedy Podcast” + “Best Female Hosted Podcast”: https://www.podcastawards.com/

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***JENNIE KAYNE: go to JENNIKAYNE.COM to get 15% off your first order when you use code CHATTY at checkout!

***FEALS: Become a member today by going to FEALS.COM/CHATTY and you’ll get 50% off your first order with free shipping!

***STAMPS.COM: go to STAMPS.COM and use promo code CHATTY to get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale!

***HONEY: Get Honey for FREE at JOINHONEY.COM/CHATTY

***UPSTART: Find out how Upstart can lower your monthly payments today when you go to UPSTART.COM/CHATTY

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:
